name: .DSK File Extension
summary: Learn about .DSK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Generic disk image format created by disk imaging programs; may be from an older program that images 3.5" diskettes, or from a newer program that creates larger disk images; often compressed to save disk space; can be mounted to appear as a disk on the desktop for Mac or within My Computer for Windows.

content: NOTE: Since the ".dsk" extension is used as a generic marker for multiple types of disk images, a DSK file created in one program may not be compatible with another program.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
